data.prayer: Lord, please give the 10,345 believers in the state of Louangphrabang the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Louangphrabang, Laos

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Louangphrabang, Laos.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 29 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Louangphrabang, Laos.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Louangphrabang, Laos, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Louangphrabang to agree with you and with one another.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Tayten people.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who are far from you in Louangphrabang. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Louangphrabang, Laos that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Louangphrabang, Laos.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Louangphrabang
location.people_groups_list: Nguan, Kiorr, Hmong Daw, Tai Long, Tamoy
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nguan (20,000), Kiorr (4,800), Hmong Daw (395,000), Tai Long (2,100), Tamoy (700)
